This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Normalize spaces
  assert_equals: expected "scroll-state(overflowing: left)" but got "scroll-state(        overflowing:left)"
[FAIL] Boolean context
  assert_equals: expected "scroll-state(overflowing)" but got "scroll-STate(overflowing)"
[FAIL] Logical with 'or'
  assert_equals: expected "scroll-state((overflowing: left) or (overflowing: bottom))" but got "scroll-state(( overflowing: LEFT) or ( OVERFLOWING: BOTTOM  ))"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
